notes.text: Setting up new dev project with the pluralsight project by Joe Eames on the mean stack.
Created new directory...npm installed --save express jade
[git init] to kick of git for source controll
created a new .gitignore file in webstorm [git status] to see what files are tracked
added .idea and node_modules to the gitignore file to keep them out of source control
[git status] again and the files have been removed from gits purview
[git add -A] to add to staging and [git commit -m 'initial commit']
